column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////What made the night so memorable was the fact that we sat right next to the most awkward first date. Ever. Some poor girl sat victim to terrible questions like
column2: "What do you look for in a guy?" and "What's your take on creme brulee?" while the guy passionately presented his grocery lists of a) why he doesn't date and b) what he looks for in a woman. Yes
column4: we might have taken a few pictures. And yes
column5: we laughed when the guy had a tray of dirty plates dropped on his head. But we about lost it when he got a free dessert out of the deal and then high-fived his date. Classic!
